name: Blade Brawl
description:
Red blades have completely taken over the stadium. Progress through each part of the stadium and defeat the red blades before it is too late.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Third Party Assets Used:

  • Cinemachine
  • TextMeshPro
  • Sherbb's Particle Collection by Sherbb from Unity Asset Store
  • League Font by FontGet from fontget.com
  • UI Casual Game Interface Pack by Wenrexa from itch.io
